dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2371 IH: Scarper Ridge Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Liccardo introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To adjust the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area to include the Scarper Ridge property.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Scarper Ridge Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act.
Section 2(a)(2) of Public Law 92–589 (16 U.S.C. 460bb–1(a)(2)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Land generally depicted as Proposed Boundary Addition on the map entitled Golden Gate National Recreation Area Proposed Boundary Addition, numbered 641/193973, and dated July 2024
